182719.en:
You, too, have abandoned the directive
and joined this settlement to gain
your freedom, haven't you, Morn?<yesno><break>

182720.en:
From today on, you are my comrade,
too!

182721.en:
Even if we are not comrades, it's okay
to slow down, Morn.

182722.en:
I tried to talk to him, but he did not
respond. He seems to be in a slumber.

182725.en:
Sanguintal is amazing. He made the lazy Wagmika do the alchemy without pushing him. I don't know who's the
master now. I think it was Sanguintal who was the director of Alchemia, wasn't it?
182725.ja:

182726.en:
Hey, you came all the way to visit the
master, too, didn't you?<yesno><break>

182727.en:
We have many visitors today. Just now,
a swordsman named Faras came to visit
me!

182728.en:
As you can see, the master is gudengden, so you'll have to be very patient if you want to hear what he
has to say, morn!

182729.en:
I feel bad for Mr. Faras. It's only because I was so oblivious to the fact that the master is forgetful. I'm
going to take a hard look at master, so please, please, please forgive me and send my apologies to Mr. Faras!

182731.en:
Oh! You're a traveler. This is Freedom Village. Freedom Village is a community of self-sufficient people
who have left the Royal City! We are a community of people who are willing to leave the Royal City and become self-
sufficient. We welcome all comers, not those who leave. That is our motto. But we keep getting visitors. Just a
few days ago, a swordsman named Faras came to visit Wagmika.

182732.en:
<pc> asked for the location
of the secret passage to Royal
Alchemia.

182734.en:
Wagmika's personal belongings were
inside. <pc> received Secret
Handles (Key Item)!<me 60>

182735.en:
Let's go back to Royal City Kimbel and
use it for Wardrobe in Director Yong's
house.

182736.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Punyah! What is it, you? What do you
want with this Wagmika?

182737.en:
What? You too? I never thought I'd see so many monophiles in a row. I've got Faras Ossa here too! He came to ask
where the secret passage is. He was a hot and bothered guy. He was annoying me, so I quickly taught him how to
open the passage and asked him to leave. May I? The wardrobe on the second floor of the villa is the
entrance to the secret passage. If you enter the password into the Wardrobe, you will be able to open a convenient
passage that will take you to the Royal Alchemia in an instant. The code is HIKKU! It's 0527! Well, I hope
you're satisfied. I'm home.

182739.en:
You take the handle. It is in the treasure chest. Attach the handle to the wardrobe and you'll be able to
enter your PIN. The code is 0527, so don't forget it!

182740.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>This is a snitch! Don't go rummaging
through people's belongings without
asking.

182741.en:
What? You came to see the former director of Royal Alchemia? Oh, I remember when Wagmika was in Royal
City, he was always bragging about having such a title. Anyway, Wagmika's residence is in the back of the
village, so you should visit there. You should visit her. She may not be in a condition to talk.
182741.ja:

182742.en:
I'm sorry, Morn. I apologize on behalf of the rude and insane master. The master when he was working as Elliet
in Royal Alchemia was not this soft. It's going to be a bit long, but let's hear the reason why the master was so
frustrated and became so soft, shall we?
182742.ja:

ã€Œå°‘ã—é•·ããªã‚‹ã‘ã©ã€€ã”ä¸»äººãŒã€€æŒ«æŠ˜ã—ã¦ ã€€ã‚„ã•ãã‚ŒãŸãƒ¯ã‚±ã‚’ã€€èã„ã¦ã„ãã‚“ã ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ³ï¼Ÿ

182743.en:
I would be happy if you could ask me
when you have time!

182744.en:
Then I will tell you a story, Morn. When he was the director of Royal Alchemia, the master was furious about
a certain guideline. Not long after that, he was fired from his job. According to the rumor, the reason he
was fired was because he refused to do a certain research in violation of the guidelines. Since the insane master
refused to do the research, I expect that it was a very unethical research, but the master won't even tell me
about it. After that, Yong-kun, who was working under the master at that time, took over the position of the
director. When master was writing a letter to Yong-kun a while ago, he overcame the temptation of demon
water, which made him unusually gudeungdengdeng. But the letter didn't seem to get a reply, and master got
desperate and drowned himself in the water that was ruining people once again. Please don't blame the master
for crying out that life sucks.
182744.ja:

182745.en:
Travelers, this is Freedom Village. Let us be free from the shackles of the guidelines! We are a community of
people who are willing to leave the Royal City and become self-sufficient.

182746.en:
It is a treasure chest filled with
Wagmika's personal belongings.

182747.en:
We need a handle for the Wardrobe on the second floor. The code is 0527. Life sucks! Life is not worth living,
Gugaru!

182748.en:
There is a very skilled alchemist close to me, so I think I'd like to learn alchemy again. But for that, I
have to start from the point of sobering up Wagmika, don't I? The path of alchemy is steep.

182749.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Huh? You gave me the wrong PIN. Yong,
you re-set it. There's no way I know
the PIN number he just reset!<bw_break>

182751.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Huh? You said Yong is dead? Is that
true?<bw_break>

183493.en:
I don't trust the guidelines. I hear that the king is using his temporal powers to update the guidelines, but
no matter how much you think about it, it's crazy that a single human decides the actions of the entire nation in
detail, no matter how kingly he may be, isn't it?

183494.en:
Tag the fields, Enyakora! Our country
will have a bountiful harvest~!

183495.en:
When I was in Royal City, I was always driven to do whatever the guidelines said I had to do. Compared to that, I
am free to do whatever I want here. The only thing that's hard is that the house is so shabby that the heat and
cold are hard on my body.

183496.en:
Private property is confiscated!
Share, share, share.

183498.en:
The water brushed from the wells made by Wagmika is as good as Royal City's drinking water. He explained that he
used alchemy to create a device to clean the water, but I couldn't understand a thing about it.

183499.en:
Oh, travelers!Welcome to Freedom Village. This is a community of people who are willing to live a self-
sufficient life based on the idea of freedom from the shackles of the Time Guidebook! This is a community of
people who are willing to live a self- sufficient life based on the idea of ''Freedom from the constraints of the
Time Guidebook''.

183500.en:
We have an Ace-class free spirit from Royal City! Her name is Wagmika, and as an expert in alchemy, she has made
our life here more comfortable by smelting useful tools one after another.

183501.en:
One day, I read in my guidelines that I had to dispose of magical creatures. When I ignored it, the Supervisor or
whatever his name was, he forcefully took my cute little buddy and took him away. How I became a free man couldn't
be more obvious.

183502.en:
I heard that Ethene Royal Palace has disappeared. So I'm suddenly worried about Mr. Faras's safety. I can't
believe that Faras is a stranger to me because of his unwavering loyalty to me, despite the fact that he has a
different master!
183502.ja:
ã€Œã‚¨ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒç‹å®®ãŒã€€æ¶ˆæ»…ã—ãŸã‚‰ã—ã„ãƒ¢ãƒ³ã€‚ ã€€ãã‚Œã§ã€€ãã‚…ã†ã«ã€€ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ©ã‚¹å›ã®èº«ãŒ ã€€å¿ƒé…ã«ãªã£ã¦ããŸã‚“ã ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ³â€¦â€¦ã€‚

183503.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>I don't see Ethene Royal Palace
anymore. Has it disappeared as
rumored?<yesno><break>

183504.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Oh, really? I'm so disappointed. I was
hoping that with the palace gone,
there would be no more Time Guidebook.

183505.en:
That's cause for celebration! Because the disappearance of the Royal Palace means that the guidelines will no
longer be updated. In other words, the people living in the Royal City will be freed from the constraints of the
guidelines!
183505.ja:
ã€Œãã‚Œã¯ã€€ãŠã‚ã§ãŸã„è©±ã­ï¼ ã€€ã ã£ã¦ã€€ç‹å®®ã®æ¶ˆæ»…ã¯ ã€€æŒ‡é‡æ›¸ã®æ›´æ–°åœæ­¢ã‚’ã€€æ„å‘³ã™ã‚‹ã®ã‚ˆã€‚

183508.en:
I heard the palace disappeared! It doesn't mean that the ruling class is gone! Now is the time for revolution!
It's finally time to start building a nation that doesn't need a guideline! I hope my comrades in arms in the
Royal City will be able to do the same. Well, the revolution for me is to stubble the fields here, so even if
there is a revolution in Royal City, I won't participate in it.
183508.ja:
ã€Œç‹å®®ãŒæ¶ˆæ»…ã—ãŸãã†ã­ï¼ï¼Ÿã€€å›½å®¶ã®æ”¯é…å±¤ãŒ ã€€ã„ãªããªã£ãŸã£ã¦ã€€ã“ã¨ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ã®ã‚ˆï¼ ã€€ä»Šã“ãã€€é©å‘½ã®ãƒãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚¹ï¼ï¼

ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ã¾ã‚ã€€ç§ã«ã¨ã£ã¦ã®é©å‘½ã¯ ã€€ã“ã“ã§ã€€ç•‘ã‚’ã€€ãŸãŒã‚„ã™ã“ã¨ã ã‹ã‚‰ ã€€ç‹éƒ½ã§é©å‘½ãŒèµ·ã“ã£ã¦ã‚‚ã€€å‚åŠ ã—ãªã„ã‘ã©ãƒ¼ã€‚

183509.en:
I moved from Royal City to this village because I didn't like the Time Guidebook. Now that the royal palace
has disappeared, I feel like I can live freely in Royal City without being bound by the Time Guidebook.

183510.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>I heard that the assholes from
Domineus have wiped out the entire
palace! Bwahahaha! I'll be damned!<bw_break>

185000.en:
You careless little bitch! The handle is in the treasure chest over there. Take it, take it, take it. Attach the
handle to the wardrobe, and you'll be able to enter your PIN. The code is 0527, so don't forget it!

187643.en:
Goshujin~n! You forgot to tell me something important! To enter the PIN code into that Wardrobe, you have to
put a handle on it!

187644.en:
May I? The Wardrobe on the second floor of the mansion is the entrance to the secret passage. If you enter
the password into the Wardrobe, you will be able to open a convenient passage that will take you to the
Royal Alchemia in an instant. The code is HIKKU! It's 0527! Well, I hope you're satisfied. I'm home.

187645.en:
Ha! That's right! I feel bad for Faras and Ossa. I only gave him the PIN number and forgot to tell him about
the handle.

189170.en:
YOU You look seriously strong. Are you a traveler? You don't seem to be from the Royal City if you don't have a
guidebook. If you have time, I'd like to ask you a favor. Seriously, would you listen to me? I actually left
Royal City to become a free man. But I've been given assignments to show that I'm ready to live here. And one
of those assignments is that if I'm on my own, I can't really have any toys. In short, I'd like to ask for help
with an assignment.
189170.ja:
ã€Œã‚¢ãƒ³ã‚¿ã€€ãƒã‚¸å¼·ãã†ã ãªã€‚æ—…ã®äººã‹ï¼Ÿ ã€€æŒ‡é‡æ›¸ã‚’ã€€æŒã£ã¦ãªã„ã£ã¦ã“ã¨ã¯ ã€€ç‹éƒ½ã‹ã‚‰æ¥ãŸã‚ã‘ã§ã‚‚ã€€ãªã•ãã†ã ã—â€¦â€¦ã€‚

ã€Œã‚“ã§ã€€ãã®èª²é¡Œã®ã²ã¨ã¤ãŒã€€ã‚ªãƒ¬ã²ã¨ã‚Šã ã¨ ã€€ãƒã‚¸ã§ã€€ã“ã“ã‚ã‚‚ã¨ãªã„ã£ã¤ãƒ¼ã‹â€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€è¦ã™ã‚‹ã«ã€€èª²é¡Œã®åŠ©ã£äººã‚’ã€€é ¼ã¿ãŸã„ã‚“ã ã€‚

189171.en:
Seriously?Well, when I heard about the assignment, I thought, ''Shojiki, I can't do it,'' but you're really
helpful. And there were three assignments. I did the wood-chopping in hell and the nightmare field work,
but I was really determined to do them. The only one left is the Echoing Sea Cave, where I have to collect a
bagful of Greenish-Blue Ore. I've heard that there's a horrifying Caterwaulin' out there, and I really
don't think I can go by myself. So I'd like to ask you for a favor. I want you to go digging with me so that you
can help me when the time comes. I need a pickaxe for digging, but Novich here in the village manages it, and
he'll lend it to me if I really ask him. When you're ready, head for the sea cave. I'll be right behind you. If
we dig in groups, we can finish quickly, and I'd like to get this over with before we get attacked. When
you're done, meet me at the disposal at the back of the cave.
189171.ja:

189172.en:
Seriously?Well, when I heard about the assignment, I thought ''Shojiki, kanben,'' but you're really helpful.
Ah, but I guess I've got my hands full right now. Think about it again when you're done with other things, okay?

189173.en:
Oh, seriously? I thought if it was
you, it would be you. Well, if you
feel like it, I'm counting on you!

189174.en:
Let's head to Echoing Sea Cave to pick
some Greenish-Blue Ore. Speaking of
which, did you borrow that pickaxe?<open_irai><bw_break>

189175.en:
You want to borrow a pickaxe for shiver mining? Yes, it's beautiful to see you working so diligently for the
good of the community. Very well! I will allow you to borrow it! However, a pickaxe is the common property of
the community. You must return it as soon as possible after use! Is that clear? Now, let's get to work!

189177.en:
Seriously, looks like I owe you a
pickaxe. Let's head to Echoing Sea
Cave. I'll be right behind you.<open_irai>

189178.en:
Oh, you're back. I gave them the ore I mined without incident, so now I'm really just waiting for the results. I
was told to wait a bit, but maybe I had to go mining alone, right? I'm really starting to wonder if I did the
right thing with the other assignments. Hey, why don't you go check it out? I think an old man named
Logichi is grading the assignments at the entrance of the village. He's doing it in a natural way, so he
doesn't get caught!

189179.en:
Well, seriously, I can't help but wonder what the results of the assignment were. Hey, why don't you go
check on him?

189180.en:
Hmmm, you must be the traveler who was with Homdi. What's the matter? Did he ask you to check up on him because he
was concerned about the boy who helped you?
189180.ja:

189181.en:
What? I've noticed that much. It doesn't affect my assignments. I'm just relieved that he knows he can
rely on his surroundings. I guess Bowes wasn't ready for the challenge of growing up behind walls, though,
being afraid of the monster. Freedom sounds good, but in reality, it means nothing. Nothing to eat. No one to
protect you. You make all your own choices and live out your days. Everything is self-sufficient. We all
share the work and assume the duties. It's ironic that we have to bear the inconvenience of freedom in order to
protect it. That guideline gave us walls, food, and a home instead of crippling us. There's no place like it
if you just want to live. I thought that the boy who just got out of the wall might not be aware of that. I
wondered if he was aware of the weight of throwing away the guidelines.

189182.en: How'd it go? Did he say anything?

189183.en:
I thought, ''I'm not going to be able to do that. When I first came to this village, I thought. It was different
from my image of free people. Everyone was supposed to be free, but they were busy chopping wood, working in the
fields, and so on. I wondered how they could do such hard work. But they seemed to be having more fun than the
adults in Royal City. But I see. This is what it means to make your own choices, and this is what it means to
do your duty to protect your freedom. All right, I get it! I'm seriously just as dependent on the people around
me as I am on the wall. I'm not ready to protect my freedom. No matter what grandpa says, I haven't really passed
the test. I'm at the moment an apprentice free spirit. I'll quickly become a full-fledged person and get
my freedom! Oh yeah, you really took care of me. This is a courtesy. Please accept it.

189184.en:
Bowles passed his assignment. If you want, you can tell Homdi about it. Whenever you're ready to abandon the
guidelines, come to me. Freedom Village welcomes you.

189185.en:
<pc> told Homdi about the
passing of the assignment and
Logichi's intention in submitting it.

189186.en:
I didn't realize that freedom is such a busy thing. But this kind of thing is not bad either. I want to be able
to do a real full-fledged job as soon as possible to make the most of my freedom!

189411.en:
Novich here in the village will lend
it to you, so please drop by and pick
it up before you go.<close_irai>

189412.en:
I think that old man Logichi at the entrance of the village is grading the assignments. He does it in a natural
way, so as not to be noticed!

189413.en:
Yes, of course I passed the assignment. If you don't mind, will you pass it on to me? Whenever you're
ready to abandon the guidelines, come to me. Freedom Village welcomes you.

189575.en:
The first thing I ask all newcomers from the Royal City to do is to burn their own Time Guidebooks. I've never
seen an immigrant bring a Time Guidebook with him. I've never seen any immigrants bring their own Time
Guidebooks with them, because they are all sick and tired of the guidelines.

189576.en:
You are a traveler from another country. Just in time. I have a favor to ask you. I am talking about
Wagmika, a newcomer, a free man, who is still a newcomer in my eyes, a newcomer to the world. Wagmika is, in
fact! He is in league with the Royal Army! He is an agent sent by the Royal Army to destroy Freedom Village! He is
a dog of the regime that is infringing on freedom! I have asked you to bring me proof of his connections to the
Royal Army. Will you accept my request?

189577.en:
Oh, you'll take care of it? Thank you, thank you, thank you. Hm. First of all, let me tell you the story step by
step. One day, I saw Wagmika, who was a stay-at-home mom, going out, and I followed her. And lo and behold! He
was talking to a soldier of the Royal Army in a friendly manner and acting as if he was reporting something. I
couldn't get close to him because I was afraid that he might find out that I was following him. Since I couldn't
get close enough to him, I didn't know what he was talking about. Most likely, the dogs of the state, who
consider free men who have abandoned the guidelines to be dangerous, are using Wagmika to gather information.
But even if the suspicion of betrayal is strong, Wagmika cannot be removed without evidence to back it up. So I
want you to investigate how Wagmika is communicating with the Royal Army and bring back the evidence.

189578.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>First, you should visit the Frontier
Guard Post and gather information. I'm
counting on you, travelers!

189579.en:
Oh, you'll take care of it? Thank you, thank you, thank you. Mm-hmm, what a thing to say. You seem to have a lot
of favors to ask of me. I appreciate your kindness, but I don't think I can ask you to do it now. Please come
again when you are free.
189579.ja:
ã€ŒãŠãŠã£ã€€å¼•ãå—ã‘ã¦ã‚‚ã‚‰ãˆã‚‹ã‹ï¼ ã€€ã‚ã‚ŠãŒãŸã‚„ã€€ã‚ã‚ŠãŒãŸã‚„ã€‚
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ã‚€ã‚€ã‚€ã€€ãªã‚“ã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã˜ã‚ƒã€‚ ã€€ãŠã¬ã—ã€€é ¼ã¾ã‚Œã”ã¨ã‚’ ã€€ãŸãã•ã‚“ã€€æŠ±ãˆã¦ãŠã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã˜ã‚ƒãªã€‚
ã€Œæ°—æŒã¡ã¯ã€€ã‚ã‚ŠãŒãŸã„ãŒã€€ä»Šã®ãŠã¬ã—ã« ã€€é ¼ã‚€ã‚ã‘ã«ã¯ã€€ã„ã‹ã‚“ã‚ˆã†ã˜ã‚ƒã€‚ ã€€æ‰‹ãŒç©ºã„ãŸã¨ãã«ã€€ã¾ãŸæ¥ã¦ãã‚Œã€‚

189580.en:
Hmmm. If you are busy, that's all
right. Please come again when you are
free.

189581.en:
It seems that the dogs of the state, who consider free men who have abandoned the guidelines as dangerous,
are using Wagmika as an agent to gather information.

189582.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>So I want you to investigate how
Wagmika is communicating with the
Royal Army and bring back proof.<bw_break>

189583.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr><close_irai>First, you should visit the Frontier
Guard Post and gather information. I'm
counting on you, travelers!

189584.en:
Oh, traveler! I see it. You have brought important evidence of the connection between Wagmika and the
Royal Army. Come on, let's get started.

189585.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>What do you want? If you have it, why
don't you just give it to me?

189586.en:
Mm? What is this liquid? Are you saying that this is proof of communication between Wagmika and the
Royal Army?

189587.en:
What is that smell? The Scandalous Water that Wagmika is often serving to the comrades of the settlement? Did
they really receive this at the meeting place?

189588.en:
Oh yeah, that's right! Now I get it! No, not Wagmika! Comrade Wagmika was working through Scandalous Water to
divide the Royal Army in order to cut it down from the bottom! Instead of infiltrating, Comrade Wagmika has been
trying to increase the number of comrades by instilling the idea of free men into the stubborn dogs of the
Royal Army. Ah! How wrong I was! I almost lost the great Comrade Wagmika, the revolutionary free man! The only
reason I didn't make a mistake is because of your efforts. Please allow me to thank you.

189589.en:
I hereby pledge to overthrow the corrupt monarchy and continue the struggle for freedom and liberty! I
hereby pledge to continue the struggle for freedom and liberty, to overthrow the corrupt monarchy!

189590.en:
Would you like to send Scandalous
Water to Bakumov?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

189592.en:
Bakumov uncorked the bottle and
smelled the Scandalous Water.

189594.en:
reported the testimony of Bynen, a member of the frontier patrol, that Scandalous Water is a
sign of friendship between the frontier patrol and Wagmika.

189595.en:
Through Scandalous Water, Comrade Wagmika was working to divide the Royal Army in order to cut it down
from the bottom. Instead of infiltrating the Royal Army, Comrade Wagmika was trying to increase the
number of comrades by instilling the idea of free men into the stubborn dogs of the Royal Army. I hereby swear
to you! I hereby pledge to continue the struggle for freedom and liberation, to overthrow the corrupt
monarchy!

191588.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Life sucks! Life is not worth living!
Mnya mnya.<bw_break>

191589.en:
Oh well. I'll give you the handle to the Wardrobe. It's in the treasure chest by the wall. Attach the handle
to the Wardrobe and you'll be able to enter your PIN. The code is 0527, so don't forget it!

191590.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>After all, life sucks! It's not worth
living. Gugah!

191591.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>He didn't seem like he'd die even if I
killed him, but he was a human, and
dying is so easy.<bw_break>

191592.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>If it were true, I would want to scold
him from the bottom of my heart!

191593.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>However, I do feel sorry for those who
got caught up in it. After all, life
sucks!

213395.en:
I have a bad feeling about the earthquakes! That's why I'm planning to send a survey team to the east
island to find a place to settle down. Whether we actually move to the island or not, investigating an unknown
island should not be a waste of time.

ã€Œæ­¢ã¾ã‚‰ãªã„åœ°éœ‡ã«ã€€ãƒ¤ãªäºˆæ„ŸãŒã€€ãƒ“ãƒ³ãƒ“ãƒ³ï¼ ã€€ãã‚“ãªã“ã‚“ãªã§ã€€ç§»ä½å…ˆã‚’ã€€ã¿ã¤ãã‚ã†ãŸã‚ ã€€æ±ã®å³¶ã«ã€€èª¿æŸ»éšŠã‚’å‡ºã™äºˆå®šã ãƒ¢ãƒ³ã€‚

213397.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>I hate that there have been so many
earthquakes lately. I wonder if this
island is safe.<bw_break>

213401.en:
The flag of liberty that protects us with its gold body, its back lights the way to Utopia, its words unite us
and make us sift toward tomorrow's labor! Hooray for Sanguintal! Hooray for Sanguintal! Hooray for Sanguintal!
Sanguintal!

213405.en:
Travelers, this is Freedom Village. We are united in the idea of freedom from the shackles of the Book of
Guidelines. But lately, as if to shake our unity, the ground has become unstable.

213407.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>Even as I'm saying it, there's an
earthquake! Earthquakes are increasing
like this.

213409.en:
Travelers, this is Freedom Village. Recently, there have been many earthquakes that have shaken our
unity. I'm worried.

213411.en:
I volunteered for the survey team that's going to be sent to the eastern island across the sea. If the
earthquakes get worse and the island is finally damaged, we'll move to a new place. I'm going to be the pilot
for that!

213413.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Even moving here was hard enough, but
moving to the East Island is a pain in
the ass. Life sucks, after all!

213415.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr><pc>! I've got some good news
for you! Talk to me in private!

213417.en:
Would you like to show the alchemist
Wagmika the Geode Crystal Recipe?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

213419.en:
<pc> showed Wagmika the Geode
Crystal Recipe.

213421.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Oh, I remember you from the other day.
I remember you... again... did you
come to me with a request?

213423.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Hiccup! A delightful recipe. It's
complicated, but it's alchemically
feasible.<bw_break>

213425.en:
The master's hand tremors were caused by his lack of self-control, and he deserved it. But I didn't listen when
the master told me that I could take the medicine from his own mouth! This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity! I
know what kind of sweet water is needed to take the medicine that the master said! Do you remember Mr. Yong,
the director of Royal Alchemia? He had such a big sweet tooth that he even made his own super-sweet Shiropp. I'm
sure there must be some sweet Shiropp in the director's office at Royal Alchemia! The director's office of
Royal Alchemia is directly accessible from the wardrobe on the second floor of Yong's house. If we can get the
Shiropp, we can give the medicine to the master! Master's rehabilitation rests on 's shoulders!
213425.ja:

ã€Œç‹ç«‹ã‚¢ãƒ«ã‚±ãƒŸã‚¢ã®æ‰€é•·å®¤ã«ã¯ ã€€ãƒ¨ãƒ³ã‚²å›ã®å®¶ã®ã€€ï¼’éšã«ã‚ã‚‹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‹ã‚‰ ã€€ç›´æ¥ã€€è¡Œã‘ã‚‹ã‚“ã ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ³ã€‚
ã€Œã‚·ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—ãŒæ‰‹ã«å…¥ã‚Œã°ã€€ã”ä¸»äººã«ã€€ãŠè–¬ã‚’ ã€€é£²ã¾ã›ã‚‰ã‚Œã‚‹ã¯ãšï¼ã€€ã”ä¸»äººã®æ›´ç”Ÿã¯ ã€€å›ã®åŒè‚©ã«ã€€ã‹ã‹ã£ã¦ã‚‹ãƒ¢ãƒ³ï¼

213427.en:
As long as I have the recipe, I can smelt anything. But I can't do complicated alchemy now that I can't
stop my hands from shaking. Well, I have a medicine on hand to cure the shaking, but it is extremely bitter!
It is too bitter to drink! If there was some sweet water to counteract the bitterness of the medicine, I would be
willing to drink it. You can't find it anywhere!

213429.en:
Would you like to give Wagmika some
Sweet Syrup?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

213433.en:
Wagmika put her tongue over the mouth
of the bottle and tasted the Sweet
Syrup.

213435.en:
I can smell the sweet~smell of you. No way, you. You brought something sweet all the way here to make me take this
super bitter medicine!

213437.en:
You really brought it, you stupid and honest fellow. But I don't like your honesty. I'm going to try that super
bitter medicine for the first time in a long time!

213439.en:
Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah! What the hell is this? No matter how much you say, it's too sweet! This is not something one
can drink!

213441.en:
I'm starting to feel sick. I want to lie down for a while. I'm sorry, but I'm going to have to give up on the
Geode Crystal for now!

213443.en:
! Thank you, Mon. Thanks to you, I met a sane master for the first time in a long time... I'd like
to toast to the master who has taken the first step toward rehabilitation with well water!
213443.ja:

213447.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>There's a super skilled alchemist
close by, so maybe I should relearn
alchemy again.

213449.en:
Even though the earthquake has subsided, my sixth sense is telling me that this island is dangerous. That's
why I'm going to send a survey team to the East Island as planned!

213451.en:
That's why there haven't been any earthquakes! It must be a prelude to a big earthquake! So the crisis is not
over yet! Comrade Sanguintal is considering relocating, just in case. There's a nice island in the East Sea.

213453.en:
Travelers, this is Freedom Village. The Royal Army has declared the earthquake over, but we must remain
vigilant!

213455.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>I understand that the quake stopped
because of the Geode Crystal, but what
really happened?

213919.en:
According to the returning survey team, there is open land on the eastern island where a village could
be built.

213921.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Let the fields fall down,
Enyakora~!We'll have a bountiful
harvest in the new land~!

213923.en:
He drank the water that ruins people, and now master is back to normal again. Damn. It's because I
went out for a bit to contact the research team in the new place.

213925.en:
I saw a meteorite falling in the direction of Royal City. Just when you think the earthquakes have subsided,
there's another one, and another, and another, and another, and another, and this island is cursed.

213927.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Let's give Comrade Holguin an Ethenel
shovel as he sets out on his journey
to a new world!

213929.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>With your shovels, may you bring about
a new earth and a bountiful harvest!

213933.en:
The treasure of a free man, who brings blessings to the land just by being idle, for the sake of a creeper! I'm
so grateful.

213935.en:
Once I saw that meteorite, I couldn't say I didn't want to emigrate. After all, life is what we make of it. I'm
going to build a home that I'll be just as attached to as this one.
213935.ja:
ã€Œå®Ÿéš›ã«ã€€ã‚ã®éš•çŸ³ã‚’ã€€ç›®ã«ã—ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã‚‰ ã€€ç§»ä½ã¯ã‚¤ãƒ¤ã ã¨ã‹ã€€ã—ã®ã”ã® ã€€è¨€ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‰ã‚Œãªããªã£ãŸã‚ã€‚

213937.en:
Travelers, this is Freedom Village. Soon, however, we will leave this place and head for a new land. We will
establish a new settlement on Strange Island to the east of this island.

213939.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>The islands to the east could not be
approached, let alone landed on, due
to the complicated ocean currents.<bw_break>

213941.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Ah~hmm? Meteorite. That's good. If I
die, I can get out of this shitty
life!

213943.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>I was going to learn alchemy from
scratch after moving to a new place.
And yet, and yet, Comrade Wagmika.

222042.en:
<pc> explained to Wagmika how
he had defeated Megalodyne.

222044.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Well, it was a risky tightrope walk!
Excuse me. That was a hiccup.

224481.en:
Comrade Sanguintal is considering moving there in case of emergency. There is a nice island in the East
Sea.

224483.en:
I've been working hard until today, hoping that one day I can lead a life as convenient as the Royal City here
in this village.

224485.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Life sucks! Life is not worth living!
Mushy?<bw_break>

224487.en:
Hmm? What is that? You want me to smelt this? There's no way I can do such a complicated alchemy if my hands
don't shake all the time. Well, I have a medicine on hand to cure the shaking, but it is extremely bitter!
It's too bitter to drink! If there was some sweet water to counteract the bitterness of the medicine, I'd be
happy to drink it. You can't find it anywhere!

224489.en:
I don't know what you use it for, but Geode Crystal is a dangerous device that sucks up the energy of the
earth's veins. Please do not use it improperly. For the first time in a long time, my thoughts have become
clear. Thinking about this feeling, I used to be in a nightmare every day.

224719.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>After we move in, we will build a
modern settlement that will rival
Royal City Kimbel!

224721.en:
It must be because the royal family of Ethene has been doing evil things for generations. The giant meteorite is
the work of them.

224723.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>But thanks to a boat built by Comrade
Wagmika, which defied the currents, we
were able to send a survey team.

229619.en:
What? I can smell the sweet smell coming from 's body! Does this mean that Yong has received
Shiropp? If so, master Shiropp now!
229619.ja:
ã€Œã‚„ã‚„ã£ï¼ï¼Ÿã€€å›ã®èº«ä½“ã‹ã‚‰ ã€€ã‚ã¾ï½ã„åŒ‚ã„ãŒã€€ãŸã ã‚ˆã£ã¦ãã‚‹ã‚“ã ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ³ï¼
ã€Œã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã¯ã€€ãƒ¨ãƒ³ã‚²å›ã®ã‚·ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’ ã€€æ‰‹ã«å…¥ã‚ŒãŸã‚“ã ãƒ¢ï½ãƒ³ï¼Ÿ ã€€ãªã‚‰ã°ã€€ä»Šã™ãã€€ã‚·ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’ã”ä¸»äººã«ï¼

245179.en:
We owe our discovery of the East Isles to the inspiration and leadership of Mr. Sanguintal. I am confident that
you will continue to use your unparalleled leadership skills to raise us to the level of exemplary
free men and women we deserve.

245290.en:
Soon I will be leaving with my comrades who live in this village for the East Island. We are going to
settle a new settlement in a new land. A new settlement of freedom-loving Etheneans, freed from the Time
Guidebook. How's that sound? It's wonderful, isn't it?
245290.ja:
ã€Œã¾ã‚‚ãªãã€€ã“ã®é›†è½ã§æš®ã‚‰ã™ã€€åŒå¿—ãŸã¡ã¨ ã€€æ±ã®å³¶ã¸ã¨ã€€æ—…ç«‹ã¤ã¨ã“ã‚ã•ã€‚ ã€€æ–°å¤©åœ°ã«ã€€æ–°ã—ã„é›†è½ã‚’ã€€é–‹æ‹“ã™ã‚‹ã‚“ã ã€‚
ã€Œæ™‚ã®æŒ‡é‡æ›¸ã‹ã‚‰ã€€è§£æ”¾ã•ã‚ŒãŸ ã€€è‡ªç”±ã‚’æ„›ã™ã‚‹ã€€æ–°ã—ã„ã‚¨ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã®æ°‘ã®é›†è½ã ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€ã©ã†ã ã„ï¼Ÿã€€ã™ã°ã‚‰ã—ã„ã ã‚ã†ã€‚

245291.en:
But I have some concerns. According to the report of the research team, it seems that there is not much edible
food on the East Island. I am an alchemist, so it would be nice if I could smelt food, but unfortunately,
my skills and knowledge are not very good. I would like to have a recipe for smelting food using only the
materials available on the East Island, but with Wagmika in the condition he is in, it's not possible.
I'd like to consult with Comrade Sanguintal, but I'm also busy with preparations for emigration. Would you
be willing to go and consult with him instead?

245292.en:
<pc> Welcome, Mon. You've
come a long way, is there something
troubling you?
245292.ja:
ã€Œ<pc>å›ã€€ã‚ˆã†ã“ãã ãƒ¢ï½ãƒ³ã€‚
ã€€é è·¯ã¯ã‚‹ã°ã‚‹ã€€ã‚„ã£ã¦ãã‚‹ãªã‚“ã¦

245293.en:
Indeed, the survey team's report also said that there seemed to be little food. Morn immediately consults with
the master!

245294.en:
I want you to make food recipes for my
comrades who are moving to the area!

245295.en:
Have you read the survey report, master? We need your help to build a self-sufficient village in the East
Island!

245297.en:
<shake_big>Gosh Jean! That's enough, Morn! Take
that medicine that Mr. Faras gave you
and make up some food recipes, Morn!

245298.en:
! I'm sorry, Mon! It's going to take some time to convince the master! I hope you will come back
again when the time is right!

245299.en:
<pc> informed Sanguintal that
Genaf wanted a recipe for smelting
food.

245300.en:
Sanguintal shivered and took a deep
breath.

245301.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Hiccup! What a pain in the ass! You'll
have to manage your own food expenses
with your own power!

245302.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>Crap! You're making too much noise.
I'm so sleepy right now! I can't be
bothered to make recipes!<bw_break>

245303.en:
I'm sure you have plenty of Medicinal Herbs growing around here, don't you? Don't rely on my alchemy recipe. Hee-
hee-hee!

245304.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>Don't be coy! I will never take bitter
pills or sweet Shiropp again!

245305.en:
I need a recipe for refining food using only the materials available on the East Island, but with Wagmika in
such a state, I'm not sure what I can do. I'd like to consult with Comrade Sanguintal, but I'm also busy
preparing to emigrate. Would you be willing to go and consult with him instead?

245306.en:
Gosh Jean! That's enough, Morn! Faras,
take the pills you gave me and make up
some food recipes, Morn!

245307.en:
! I'm sorry, Morn! It's going to take some time to persuade the master, so I can't stay here for
now! I'll do whatever I can to get master to take the medicine and make a food recipe, so please come back when
you're done convincing him!

245308.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>No! Don't look so scared! I will never
take bitter pills or sweet Shiropp
again!

245309.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>No! Don't look so scared! I will never
take bitter pills or sweet Shiropp
again!

245310.en:
Would you give Genaf the Efficient
Alchemy Food Book?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

245311.en:
<pc> gave Genaf the Efficient
Alchemy Food Book.

245312.en:
Genaf's face gradually clouded as he
read through the Efficient Alchemy
Food Book.

245313.en:
Oh, did Wagmika create a food recipe
for you?

245314.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I see. I'm in a bit of a hurry because
I don't have much time left before I
have to leave for the East Island.

245315.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Oh, thank goodness for that! I'll
check out the recipe right away.

245316.en:
I don't know how to do this kind of advanced alchemy. It's too difficult for a poor alchemist like me from the
very first step. It would be futile to ask Wagmika if there is a simpler recipe. The level is too different to
begin with. I would be grateful if it were a recipe that can be smelted more easily.

245317.en:
That's right! Maybe that customer of ours can make a recipe that's easy to make. My alchemy skills aren't great,
but I'm really good at finding and collecting materials. I make money by collecting materials. I receive
requests from various alchemists, but there is a client in Royal City Kimbel who often sends me letters of request.
The contents of his letters reveal a wealth of knowledge, and he explains more about him so that I can
understand. He must be a very caring person. The alchemist in Royal City Kimbel is named Luon. He's busy
preparing for his new residence, so I was wondering if you could go and ask him for me.

245318.en:
The alchemist's name is Luon. I'd like you to ask him if he could simplify the recipe for high-performance
alchemical foods for me. Since he seems to be a person who is not bound by the Time Guidebook, I once invited
him to come to this village, but he refused because he has an important family. Although I have never met him
in person, I think he is a fine person who is worthy of our comradeship. I am sure he will help us with the
immigration.

245319.en:
Would you give Genaf the Mysterious
Bean Book?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

245320.en:
<pc> gave Genaf the
Mysterious Bean Book.

245321.en:
Genaf's face grew brighter and
brighter as he read the Mysterious
Bean Book.

245322.en:
Oh, did they rewrite that recipe into
a quick and easy recipe, by any
chance?

245323.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I see. I'm in a hurry because I don't
have much time left.

245324.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Gobble. I'd appreciate it if it's an
easy recipe that even I can concoct.
I'll check it out right away.

245325.en:
I think even I can make these beans. If I have these beans, I'm sure I'll be able to successfully migrate to a
new place and build a great village. I have already decided with my comrades. We are going to name the village
Ethene Village. You helped me a lot, didn't you? Thank you. Comrade ! I hope you come to see
Ethene Village someday.

245327.en:
But to be honest, I have my doubts. I need to see if I can properly smelt Mysterious Beans with my skill of
alchemy. I'll give it a try right away. As a final request, I would like you to thank Comrade Sanguintal on my
behalf.

245328.en:
As a final request, I would like you to thank Comrade Sanguintal on my behalf. I'm going to try my hand at
alchemy right now.

245329.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>I'll have to see if I can properly
smelt Mysterious Beans with my alchemy
skills. I'll give it a try right away.

245434.en:
Hey, you saw her too! She was so beautiful. What? You haven't seen her? She's a woman with big ice blue eyes.
She's not from our village, so I was talking to her, wondering who she was, when suddenly she disappeared in a
flash of light.

245435.en:
Well, I just picked up a ring, but I think it was dropped by that beautiful woman. I'm sure it's very important,
so I'll give it to her when I see her! I'll hold on to it until then. Besides, isn't Umater a person who
lived about 700 years ago? I think the ring you're looking for is different.

245436.en:
<pc> told Nebri that he had
come to Freedom Village to investigate
the ring that Umater had made.

245437.en:
Nebri is not going to give us the
ring, let's go back to Malfe's place.

245438.en:
It's true that I picked up the ring, but I think it was dropped by the woman who disappeared in the light.
I'm sure it's very important, so I'll hold on to it until then so that I can give it to her when I see her again.
Besides, isn't Umater a person who lived about 700 years ago? I think it's different from the ring you're
looking for.

245439.en:
Nebri is not going to give us the
ring, let's go back to Malfe's place.

245450.en:
It will take some time to persuade Wagmika. Let's wait and see Sanguintal in Freedom Village when the persuasion
is over.

245537.en:
I picked up a ring the other day, but I think it was dropped by a woman who disappeared in the light. I'm sure
it's very important, so I'll hold on to it until then so that I can give it to her when I see her again.

246941.en:
Gosh Jean! Faras gave me a potion to make me a sane master again! I want to be a squire again, and I want to take
a grudge against the master!
